ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: but few of the later ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And a few of later ages,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and a few from later times.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and only a few of them from the later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And a few from the latter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And a few of those will be from the later ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And a few from among the latter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and how few of the later folk)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And a few of those of later time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and a lesser number from the later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And a few from the later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and a few from the latter ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And a few from those of later times.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And a few of those (foremost) will be from the later time (generations).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: but only a few from the later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And a small band from the latecomers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And a few of the later peoples,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:14] and a few from the later ones, from among the community of Muhammad (s), being the foremost from among the communities of old and this community (the predicate [is the following, ‘alā sururin mawdūnatin]),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And a few of those of later time) and a group from the later nations, which is the community of Muhammad (pbuh). It is also said that both groups are from the community of Muhammad (pbuh). When Allah's saying (A multitude of those of old), the Prophet (pbuh) and his Companions were aggrieved because of it, until Allah revealed (And a few of those of later time).
